thread.title: Carson: I won't go on Saturday Night Live
thread.title_full: Carson: I won't go on Saturday Night Live - POLITICO

author: Todd S. Purdum
title: Carson: I won't go on Saturday Night Live
text:
Don’t expect Ben Carson to show off his alter-ego bartender on Saturday Night Live any time soon. The Republican candidate says he has no desire to host the late-night comedy show. “I think the presidency of the United States is a very serious thing,” Carson told Bloomberg Politics. “I don’t even want to begin to put it in the lightness of comedy.”
The retired neurosurgeon was asked if he’d be interested in hosting the show by Bloomberg's Mark Halperin and John Heilemann in a pre-released clip of their show “With All Due Respect.”
Businessman Donald Trump is scheduled to host SNL next month; former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton recently appeared as bartender “Val” on the show, where she gave advice to herself, played by cast-member Kate McKinnon.
